entry.data:
RAIN
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
